stateDiagram

OFF

OFF : OFF

OFF : enter / #123; print("---")#59; #125;

state ON_GROUP {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as ON_GROUP.(InitialState)

        ON1

        ON1 : ON1

        ON1 : enter / #123; print("$--")#59; #125;

        ON2

        ON2 : ON2

        ON2 : enter / #123; print("$$-")#59; #125;

        ON3

        ON3 : ON3

        ON3 : enter / #123; print("$$$")#59; #125;

        ON3 : enter / #123; count += 1#59; #125;

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

OFF --> ON1 : inc

OFF --> ON_GROUP : toggle

ON_GROUP --> OFF : toggle

ON_GROUP.(InitialState) --> ON1

ON1 --> ON2 : inc

ON1 --> OFF : dim

ON2 --> ON3 : inc

ON2 --> ON1 : dim

ON3 --> ON2 : dim

ROOT.(InitialState) --> OFF
Events
settings
